Sentencas: In this paper, the technical and economic feasibility of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Battery Hybrid Vehicles is studied based on Iran conditions and compared against Polymer Electrolyte Fuel Cell (PEFC) Vehicles, Battery Electric Vehicles (BEV) and Gasoline Vehicles.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles

Sentencas: Existence of enormous resources of natural gas and its extensive distribution and transmission lines in Iran are a great opportunity to develop SOFC-Battery hybrid vehicles fueled by natural gas.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles

Sentencas: In this paper, energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions and life cycle cost were analyzed.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles

Sentencas: We ranked different vehicles in 2021 and forecast their ranking for 2030, which is crucial for policymaking and technology support.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles

Sentencas: The results show the well to wheel energy consumption of SOFC-Battery hybrid vehicle per km in 2021 is nearly same as PEFC FCEVs and 1060 kJ and 560 kJ less than gasoline and battery electric vehicle respectively.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles

Sentencas: The well to wheel emission of SOFC FCEVs in 2021 is a little less than PEFC FCEV and 50% and 28% lower, respectively than gasoline vehicle and BEV.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles

Sentencas: It is expected that the life cycle cost per km on a charge of SOFC hybrid vehicles with equal driving range will be the best choice in 2030 with 23.9 cents per km.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of solid oxide fuel cell vehicles in a natural gas producing country; comparison with proton electrolyte fuel cell, battery and gasoline vehicles
